name: Auto Scrolling Testimonials
author: Opensourcetechnologies

sections.description:
Auto Scrolling Testimonials plugin allows you to show testimonials with auto scrolling effect in the side bar by using widget. There is also a shortcode functionaility which helps to show testimonials records in pages. To show testimonials on pages you can use the shortcode [astlist]. This shortcode also accepts the different arguments. For example [ostlist nop=”no of testimonials” order=”rand”].

For video tutorial : Click here
sections.installation:
1. Download auto-scrolling-testimonials.zip
  2. Goto wp-admin->Plugins menu->Add New
  3. Click tab “upload” givne just below the title.
  4. Click on browse button to select plugin file.

  5. Activate the plugin from the Administration Dashboard

  6. Open the Widgets page under the Appearance section

  7. Drag the Show Posts By Category widget to the active sidebar
  8. Configure the widget options to suit your needs and click Save

short_description: Display the testimonials in scrolling sidebar widget and list of testimonials in any page by using shortcode.
